mapper.insert: insert into dictionary (dic_id, dic_type, dic_discribe, dic_code, dic_value) values (#{dicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicDiscribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select dic_id, dic_type, dic_discribe, dic_code, dic_value from dictionary
